messages.body:
DEAR PARTNER,

I AM MR. BENSON JACK, THE BILL AND EXCHANGE MANAGER AT THE FOREIGN EXCHANGE
DEPARTMENT OF INTERNATIONAL BANK OF BURKINA(IBB) OUAGADOUGOU IN BURKINA
FASO. WITH DUE RESPECT AND REGARDS, I HAVE DECIDED TO CONTACT YOU ON A BUSINESS
TRANSACTION THAT WILL BE VERY BENEFICIAL TO BOTH OF US AT THE END OF THE
TRANSACTION.DURING MY INVESTIGATION AND AUDITING IN MY DEPARTMENT, I CAME
ACROSS A VERY HUGE SUM OF MONEY BELONGING TO A DECEASED PERSON, A FOREIGNER
WHO DIED IN A PLANE CRASH WITH HIS INTIRE FAMILY.

REPLY ONLY TO MY PRIVATE E-MAIL bensonjackbj02@yahoo.fr

THE FUND HAS BEEN IN HIS ACCOUNT WITH THE BANK WITHOUT ANY CLAIM OF THE
FUND IN OUR CUSTODY EITHER FROM HIS FAMILY OR RELATION BEFORE OUR DISCOVERY
TO THIS DEVELOPMENT.ALTHOUGH PERSONALLY, I KEPT THIS INFORMATION SECRET
WITHIN MYSELF TO ENABLE THE WHOLE PLANS AND IDEA BE PROFITABLE AND SUCCESSFUL
DURING THE TIME OF EXECUTION. THE AMOUNT INVOLVED IS USD$10.500,000 (TEN
MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND U.S DOLLARS.) MEANWHILE THE WHOLE ARRANGEMENT
AND DIRECTIVES NEEDED TO PUT CLAIM OVER THIS FUND AS THE NEXT OF KIN TO
THE DECEASED, WILL BE FORWARD TO YOU UPON YOUR ACCEPTANCE. INFORMATION WILL
BE RELAYED TO YOU AS SOON AS YOU INDICATE YOUR INTEREST AND WILLINGNESS
TO ASSIST ME AND ALSO BENEFIT YOURSELF TO THIS GREAT BUSINESS OPPORTUNITY.

IN FACT I COULD HAVE DONE THIS DEAL ALONE BUT BECAUSE OF MY POSITION IN
THIS COUNTRY AS A CIVIL SERVANT, WE ARE NOT ALLOWED TO OPERATE A FOREIGN
ACCOUNT AND WOULD EVENTUALLY RAISE AN EYE BROW ON MY SIDE DURING THE TIME
OF TRANSFER BECAUSE I WORK IN THIS BANK. THIS IS THE ACTUAL REASON WHY IT
WILL REQUIRE A SECOND PARTY OR FELLOW WHO WILL FORWARD CLAIMS AS THE NEXT
OF KIN TO THE BANK AND ALSO PRESENT A FOREIGN ACCOUNT WHERE HE
WILL NEED THE MONEY TO BE TRANSFERRED INTO ON HIS REQUEST AS IT MAY BE,
AFTER DUE VERIFICATION AND CLARIFICATION TO DESIGNATED BANK ACCOUNT.

YOU CAN  SEE THE WEBSITE BELOW COVERING THE PLANE CRASH BY CNN & BBC NEWS.

http://www.cnn.com/2003/WORLD/africa/12/26/benin.crash

http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/africa/3348109.stm

I WILL NOT FAIL TO INFORM YOU THAT THIS TRANSACTION IS 100% RISK FREE. ON
SMOOTH CONCLUSION OF THIS TRANSACTION, YOU WILL BE ENTITLED TO 40% OF THE
TOTAL SUM WHILE 60% WILL BE FOR ME. YOU HAVE BEEN ADVISED TO KEEP TOP SECRET
AS I AM STILL IN SERVICE AND INTEND TO RETIRE FROM SERVICE AFTER I CONCLUDE
THIS DEAL WITH YOU.

I WILL BE MONITORING THE WHOLE SITUATION HERE IN THE BANK UNTIL YOU CONFIRM
THE MONEY IN YOUR ACCOUNT AND ASK ME TO COME DOWN TO YOUR COUNTRY FOR SUBSEQUENT
SHARING OF THE FUND ACCORDING TO PERCENTAGES PREVIOUSLY INDICATED AND FURTHER
INVESTMENT, EITHER IN YOUR COUNTRY OR ANY OTHER COUNTRY YOU MAY ADVICE ME
TO INVEST IN. ALL OTHER NECESSARY INFORMATION WILL BE SENT TO YOU WHEN I
HEAR FROM YOU. I SUGGEST YOU GET BACK TO ME AS SOON AS POSSIBLE STATING
YOUR WISH IN THIS DEAL.

PLEASE REPLY TO MY PRIVATE E-MAIL  bensonjackbj02@yahoo.fr
BY INDICATING YOUR BANK ACCOUNT DETALS WHERE THE FUND WILL BE TRANSFERED
TO. ALSO, SEND ME YOUR PRIVATE PHONE NUMBER FOR EASY COMMUNICATION.

BEST REGARD,
MR. BENSON JACK,

Dear Brother Mark.
 
Thanks for your response. I want you to understand that, this is our time and opportunity to be rich. So, let us handle this great opportunity with one mind without any delay.  I want to inform you that also, this transaction is not a child's play and is considered as part of my prospective achievement in life as a banker haven worked for years without concrete evidence of my achievement in the banking field and thus, must be given all the vital attention that will make it to work for our corporate interest to be achieved. 
 
Below is more data information covering this transaction and should be vigorously studied. The data  information of this transaction is given for your understanding of the detail account of the Fund deposited by DR. COCO JONAN before he died in a BENIN plane crash with his family .The members of his family who died with  him including his In-laws  are as follows; Dr Coco Jonan, 68 years been the depositor of the fund, His wife, Jean, 67; three of their children,  Lois, Beth and Richard.
You can still see again the website covering the death:
http://www.cnn.com/2003/WORLD/africa/12/26/benin.crash 
 
http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/africa/3348109.stm
         "LATE DR. COCO JONAN'S ACCOUNT DETAILS"
 
NAME OF THE DEPOSITOR.........DR. COCO JONAN 
AMOUNT DEPOSITED..................... U.S $10.5 MILLION
TYPE OF ACCOUNT OPERATED........CURRENT ACCOUNT
ACCOUNT NUMBER..........................18463464711.
STATE OF ORIGIN...............................OMAN
NATIONALITY.........................................JORDAN
MARITAL STATUS.........MARRIED WITH THREE (3) CHILDREN
AGE OF THE DECEASED CUSTOMER...........68years
HIEGHT......................................................1.72M
SEX............................................................MALE
RELIGION....................................................CHRISTAINITY
QUALIFICATION...........................................DOCTOR.
BUSINESS IN AFRICA.......CONTTACTOR WITH THE 
ECONOMIC COMMUNITY  OF WEST AFRICAN STATES (ECOWAS)
 
In the bank form for next of kin,DR. COCO JONAN  Before his death filled his wife JEAN COCO as his next of kin but unfortunately, the wife died with him along others and therefore, there is nobody left behind to claim the fund as his next of kin and bank law stated that, if such fund remain unclaim for four (4) years then, the fund will be transfered into the bank treasury as unclaimed bill. Base on that, I contacted you and proposed it as a deal between us so that we can move the fund into your bank account.  So, let us do this transaction instead of the fund to be transfer into the bank treasury as unclaimed bill.
 
After studying the Data information above, What I want you to do will be to provide an account where this fund can be transferred for us and also send a application to the bank for the claiming of the said fund pretending before the bank through writing that you are the next of kin to the late DR. COCO JONAN as I directed you in the application form.
 
I am assuring you that, the bank will accord you the recognition and have the fund transferred into your account for us to share as I told you on percentage levels. I want you to know that, if you are serious and willing to assist me get this fund into your account then, consider yourself rich at the end of this transaction.
Note:  it will not be hard for both of us to move the fund into your bank account if we do this deal with one mind. This is a secret deal and I don't want you to let anybody notice this transaction until the fund is confirmed in your bank account for my safety here since I am still in service.
 
I want you to know that, next of kin can be a brother, sister, mother, uncle, cusin, naphew, wife, son or even far relation from different continet in the world. You should also understand that, Bank is not interested to know if you are bearing the same surname with the deceased or not. The Bank is interested to know if the account details of the deceased and the amount mentioned above is in the account which I know that the information provided is correct and must convince the bank director for the immediate transfer of the fund into your account.
Furthermore, Don't forget that I am here in the bank to back you up in this transaction and as such, you should not be afraid but to bring good ideas that will help us to get this fund into your account successfully. Be inform that, I got your contact from Burkina Faso chambers of commerce and I strongly believe that any information receive from the above mentioned office is correct and must to be trusted. Can I trust you ?  I hope that you will not betray me when the fund is transfered into your bank account ? I hope I will not regret transferring the fund into your account ??? If you give me my share (60%) when the fund is transfered into your bank account, I promise to invest my share in your country under your care and control.
 
I will be waiting to hear from you as soon as you send the application to the bank e-mail address as I directed you. If you have any question to ask me, please contact me through my private phone number 00226 76665965 and I will educate you more.
May our Lord Bless you for your kind understanding in this transaction.
 
Yours brother
Mr Benson Jack.

messages.body:
Dear Benson

Apologies for the tardiness in my reply. I have recently been on a spiritual journey and am considering changing my allegience to a different faith. This has been a troubling time for me and I am thinking that this money will actually do me better if I am not a member of the priesthood. You dont get money for nothing as they say but my heart tells me you get love over gold. Maybe the money will allow me to get my chicks for free... who knows.

Anyway... You have sent me so much information that I am now unsure what to do. You have sent me a mail with a form and the details completed (in this mail) and another one which is empty but has my details in it. I can see that I need to complete a form with my details but what are the ones in this mail for??

Br. Mark

messages.body:
Hello Benson

I have been away this weekend to visit another poor orphanage. Its so sad to see all those children in such a state of poverty. I was discussing it with Brother Peter Gabriel while climbing up on Salisbury Hill (its very pretty, you can see the city lights) when it hit me like a sledgehammer. I could give a huge chunk of money to their order and help them too. It was so great to see them play games without frontiers. Hans was playing with Lottie and Lottie was playing with Jane, Jane was playing with Willy (and he stopped crying and was happy again). My heart was warmed.

Anyway, I digress. Enclosed is the form for you to have a look at

Any questions, please let me know

Br. M

messages.body:
My dear Benson

My dear friend Brother Phil Collins received this mail so I am most anxious to get this moving.

"Hello, Father Collins.   I have been away In Paris walking the Parisian walkways, with Sister Lizzy who is a very thin due to her illness. In have been told that you may be negotiating a sum of money . This being the case Could I ask for a small sum to Help Sister Lizzy with her illness.  Sister Lizzy became sick after accepting a nice cup of Rosalie from a man with a bad reputation. But don't believe a word if they tell you she was on the brink of suicide. All I want to do is see her again dancing in the moon light with her in the spotlight.
I am waiting for Father Goram and Father Lynott to arrive back at the convent  so when the boys are back in town we can talk over a nice cup of Rosalie, or some whiskey from the Jaro and plan Sister Lizzy's recovery.
.,
Please hear our prayer.

Mother Rosy Cox "

We are so close for the big time so dont give up on me but I am beginning to worry if the authority is involved. I still believe that there is love over gold but while walking down the telegraph road I saw a sultan swinging out of the corner of my eye which is a bad omen in my faith.
I have received this form back from the bank but the name for the beneficiary isnt correct and they want me to contact some barrister for some forms relating to drugs money from the USA. You are not in the USA and they are not involved in this whatsoever. What do we need forms for this for?
Please help

Br Mark

messages.subject: CONTACT THE LAWYER IMMEDIATELY
messages.body:
Received: from  

 
Dear  Mark.
 
I got your mail and I understood your message very well. I understood that, the bank have approved the fund to us. To God be the glory. I also understood that, The Bank want you to come to Burkina Faso with the Death Certificate of the Deceased and the Anti-Drug Law Clearance certificate.
 
According to the advice of the bank, the two documents will back up the fund so that, your Government will not question us about the origin of the fund. That is good suggestion from the bank but unfortunately, I don't have the Death Certificate nor the Anti-Drug Law Clearance certificate.
 
My good brother Rolando, I don't have the documents and I don't know how to get it. I will suggest that, you should contact the lawyer to do the work for us. Also, if I permit you to go to the bank and sign off the fund as the bank requested for your present, it will be difficult for you because the bank may ask you some questions about the deceased customer Late Dr.George Brumley and his family which you may not answer their questions correctly and it may lead us to miss this fund.
 
As to avoid any mistake from your side when you appeare here, I will advice you to copy the below message and send it to the lawyer's e-mail address immediately.
 
I want you to put all your effort to see that the fund is release within this week into your bank account as to enable me and my family to come over there.

As you can see, the only solution is to contact the lawyer as to help us out by obtaining those legal documents from the High Court and submit it to the bank. I pray for the lawyer to agree to work for us because without the attorney, it will be difficult for the fund to get into our bank account.

Hello my dear Benson

You must appreciate that weekends are my busiest time. I barely have time to draw breath with all the weddings, christenings and normal services and by the time I can have a few minutes, all I want to do is collapse in the chair and have a nice cup of tea. The form has been sent to the barrister fellow

Blessings to the lord

Br. Mark

Dear Mr Benson

I have a dear friend who was keen to meet you but a rolling stone gathers no moss and I had to say goodbye to Ruby, Tuesday. She was an artist of great standing. She had a strange colour obsession and if she saw a red door she would want to paint it black. Its a shame. I actually went to the gym (yes even the priesthood like to workout) and did some jumping jack flashes ( they are a gas.. you should try it) and although I want a muscled body for myself , you cant always get what you want and sometimes I cant get no satisfaction from my workout. I have seen an advert for a dance class (do you like to dance) where I can learn the Harlem shuffle, which sounds like fun. I have a pretty good social life with my congregation, even the honky tonk women. As we are soon to meet, what do you like to do with your spare time?

Br Mark

messages.body:
My dear Benson

I have a visitor from our French part of the brotherhood, Brother Bon Jovi (it means good Jovi in French) whose life is like living on a prayer and he keeps the faith in another country for us. He is a natural healer and I like him to lay his hands on me. I feel like ive been shot through the heart with love when he does so. I only tell you this as I dont want you to be upset if I dont reply over the weekend as I need to play host to my guest. I feel we are so close and I can produce the money in a blaze of glory although I do confess to having the thought that I could just take the money and run and become wanted dead or alive. Im sure my faith will prevent me.
I am concerned that I need to send so much money though.... Can you not organise a payment of some kind? You work at the bank so surely you can hide the payment to the barrister for a few days so that when the money comes through you can put it back? If you can do that I will love you, always.
I look forward to hearing from you

Br. Mark

Dear Benson

It looks like it maybe possible for our parish to arrange payment. Unfortunatley anything which requires to go through a comittee is never a fast process. I have been talking to the Madonna, like a prayer for example. Brother Papa is the head of the funding comittee and like to preach to everyone, Papa dont preach we all shout , but it doesnt make any difference. But I was thinking and an idea hit me like a ray of light and I was frozen for a moment as it hit me. Why dont we take the money out of the balance. You cant stop me once Ive got into the groove and I know that idea is borderline it could work. If not then its going to have to wait until the comittee comes into vogue with us and doesnt think its for a holiday.
What do you think?

Br Mark

Dear Mr Benson

Today I have been to the zoo with some poor orphaned children, the girls and boys like it there. We saw the gorillaz (we also thought we saw Clint Eastwood and maybe that he was there for a dare. we all liked him in Dirty Harry) but we all feel good inc the person who was showing us about. He used to have a very big house in the country as he liked his parklife we heard. Its children like these that we are desperate to help. Do you really think that I am not trying my best to raise such a small sum of money for such a great reward. You are such a charmless man sometimes, perhaps its the language barrier. I will keep trying for this until theres no otherway and I am left with coffee and TV only.

messages.body:
Dear Benson

I am slightly worried about this barrister fellow. I have given him all the information he asks for but then he asks me for it again. He doesnt sound very competant. Can we find someone else?
I am flying out to Siera Leone on 24th Feb on flight BA6655 an d expect to arrive late in the evening. I havnt heard back from you yet regarding somewhere to stay. The last ime I was in a hotel in california there were eagles everywhere. I am not from a celibate order and so hopefully will find some lady loving while I am there. I dont want to be in heartbreak hotel during my visit. Brother Leonard Cohen likes the Chelsea hotel so I would like something similar to that. Its in Sloane Square in London so if you have a look there on the web Im sure you will get the idea of what we are looking for. I hope that looking for ladies doesnt have and problem with the police. They often smell and I have to tell them not to stand so close to me and I dont want anyone to be putting on a red light, particularly sister Roxanne otherwise Ill be so lonely. There will be about 5 of us coming now. Will we need sunblock, I have heard its an invisible sun but still very powerful. Do you have a beach nearby, I was hoping to send a message in a bottle to my friends, always been a wish.

Anyway, I am excited to be coming over as you can probably tell and look forward to seeing you very soon.

Br Mark
